heisig_chinese_memo: The fire underneath the cliff will eventually turn everything above to ashes.
heisig_story: The kanji for ashes naturally includes the primitive for fire, or more specifically, a fireplace. Now what do you do with that bucket of ashes you have just cleaned out of the fireplace? You walk to the edge of a cliff and tip it upside down, watching as they are swept away in the wind like a swarm of gray mosquitoes. Thus the fire, once it has turned to ashes, ends up at the bottom of the cliff.
koohiiStory1: The fire underneath the cliff will eventually turn everything above to ashes.
koohiiStory2: Scene from "The Big Lebowski" : Walter scatters Donny´s ashes, but a wind blows much of the ashes into "The Dude" Lebowski´s face. Upset, The Dude lashes out at Walter. Walter apologizes and hugs The Dude, before suggesting "Fuck it, man. Let´s go bowling." I bet you that The Dude wanted to cremate (fire) Walter right there and then, at the top of the cliff! (thanks Elktapestry).

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: On a cliff, a fire burns to ashes. The ashes then blow off the cliff, and follow the wind wherever it may go.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: See the light from the fire as the ashes fly off the cliff. The wind carries some of the ashes over to you. Feel the ashes as they strike your face and wipe the black ash with your hands.

WaniKani_Reading_Info: Ashes on my face. Falling from the cliff of fire. Gives my life meaning. Or just come up with your own haiku. Whatever works for you.

humanum_full_description_en:
From " fire ", from " again " (hand shape), it means picking up fire ashes by hand. The original meaning is the residual powder after the substance is fully burned. "Said the text": "The dead fire is still there. From the fire to the other. And, the hand. The fire is extinguished and can be held." It means that the embers can be held by the hand after the fire is extinguished. "Book of Rites‧ Moon Order": "﹝Midsummer's Moon" does not burn ashes." Zheng Xuan's note: "The one that extinguishes fire is ashes." Ash, to conquer the turtle."

" Ash " can be extended to dust and dirt. The third poem of Tang Bai Juyi's "Swallow Tower": "See that white poplar can be used as a pillar, but red powder can't turn into ashes?" "Song History·Shihuo Zhixia·Salt": "Folk salt is mixed with ash."

" Gray " also refers to the color between black and white. "Book of Jin-Guo Pu Biography": "There are things from time to time, as big as a buffalo, gray and low knee..." Qing Huang Zunxian "Chaozhou Xing": "The face of the bed is gray, absurd Not afraid".

" Ash " can be used as a verb and means to burn. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·The Biography of Wenyuan·Du Du": "Burnt Kangju, gray and rare." Jin Gehong, "Baopuzi, Release Stagnation": "A wood that is not ash, a fire that is not hot."

" Gray " can also be used as an adjective, as a metaphor for depression and depression. Tang Zhanghu "Walking a pen to present Xu Jiu's fate to Guizhou": "Straight qi disappears from the miasma, and there is no temporary ash in the distant heart." Song Luyou, "Shu Zhong Ou Shu": "Sifang is originally a husband's business, and Baishou is not ashamed of self-pity."

humanum_full_description:
從「火」，從「又」（手形），表示用手撮取火灰，本義為物質充分燃燒後殘留的粉狀物。《說文》：「死火餘㶳也。从火从又。又，手也。火既滅，可以執持。」意謂火滅之後，餘燼可用手執持。《禮記‧月令》：「﹝仲夏之月﹞毋燒灰。」鄭玄注：「火之滅者為灰。」《史記‧龜策列傳》：「不信不誠，則燒玉靈，揚其灰，以徵後龜。」

　　「灰」可引申為塵土、污垢。唐白居易〈燕子樓〉詩之三：「見說白楊堪作柱，爭教紅粉不成灰？」《宋史‧食貨志下‧鹽》：「民間食鹽，雜以灰土。」

　　「灰」也指介於黑白間的顏色，《晉書‧郭璞傳》：「時有物，大如水牛，灰色卑膝……」清黃遵憲〈潮州行〉：「扶床面色灰，謬言不畏懼」。

　　「灰」可用作動詞，指燃燒。《後漢書‧文苑傳上‧杜篤》：「燔康居，灰珍奇。」 晉葛洪《抱樸子‧釋滯》：「不灰之木，不熱之火。」

　　「灰」亦可用作形容詞，比喻消沉、沮喪。唐張祜〈走筆贈許玖赴桂州命〉：「直氣自消瘴，遠心無暫灰。」宋陸游〈舟中偶書〉：「四方本是丈夫事，白首自憐心未灰。」

灰字的基本解释

灰
huī
物体燃烧后剩下的东西，经烧制后形成的产品：纸灰。灰烬。洋灰。灰飞烟灭。
尘土：灰尘。
特指“石灰”：灰墙。灰膏。
黑白之间的颜色：灰色。灰质（脑和脊髓的灰色部分）。灰沉沉。
志气消沉：心灰意懒。

灰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huī］
［《廣韻》呼恢切，平灰，曉。］
(1)物质充分燃烧后残留的粉状物。
(2)尘土；污垢。
(3)特指芦草灰。古人传说，在战争中受到围困，月亮就出现晕圈。以芦草灰画成圆环而缺其一面，则月晕相应亦缺，而敌之包围即松懈易破。
(4)特指古代候气的葭灰。
(5)石灰的省称。
(6)用灰洗濯。
(7)指涂刷。
(8)碎裂。
(9)烧毁；燃烧。
(10)介于黑色与白色之间的一种颜色。
(11)沮丧；消沉。
(12)不光彩；暗昧无知。
(13)关系疏远的。参见“灰孫子”。

灰
“灰”字本义为火后余烬,是一个会意字。在古文字形中,“灰”上边为
一只手的形状,下边为燃烧着的火。整个字形的意思是火熄灭后,可以用手触
碰的剩余物是灰。现在,“灰”也指尘土,如灰生。现实生活中常见“灰墙”、
“灰膏”,这里的“灰”指的是石灰。“灰”还表示一种,心情状态,如“灰心”、
“心灰意懒”。此外,“灰”也指颜色,即灰色。

серый
Первоначальное значение слова «пепел» - угольки после огня, что является знающим словом.
У древних иероглифов верхняя часть «пепла» - это форма руки, а нижняя часть - пылающий огонь.
Весь глиф означает, что после тушения огня остатки, к которым можно прикоснуться руками, представляют собой пепел.
«Ясень» также относится к пыли, например, золе.
«Серая стена» и «серая штукатурка» обычны в жизни, где «серая» относится к извести.
«Серый» также означает состояние настроения, например, «уныние» и «уныние, ленивый».
Кроме того, «серый» также относится к цвету, то есть к серому.

Meaning Mnemonic
On a cliff, a fire burns to ashes. The ashes then blow off the cliff, and follow the wind wherever it may go.
See the light from the fire as the ashes fly off the cliff. The wind carries some of the ashes over to you. Feel the ashes as they strike your face and wipe the black ash with your hands.
Reading Mnemonic
The ashes inspire you to write a haiku (はい). Using the ashes you write a haiku on a rock for everyone to enjoy.
Ashes on my face. Falling from the cliff of fire. Gives my life meaning. Or just come up with your own haiku. Whatever works for you.
